main event: A father and his nine-year-old son observed two round objects passing overhead in Rome, Georgia, on April 6, 1955.
interesting points: The sighting included two objects flying at approximately 10,000 to 15,000 feet altitude., The objects appeared shiny and were observed through haze., They were first seen moving from south to north., The observation lasted for about two minutes., An investigation suggested that the objects were likely misidentified jets from a training flight in the area.
sighted object: two round shiny objects in the sky
